name: ListCards
description:
Retrieves a list of cards owned by the account making the request.
A max of 25 cards will be returned.

cursor.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this to retrieve the next set of results for your original query.

See [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/basics/api101/pagination) for more information.

customer_id.description:
Limit results to cards associated with the customer supplied.
By default, all cards owned by the merchant are returned.

include_disabled.description:
Includes disabled cards.
By default, all enabled cards owned by the merchant are returned.

reference_id.description: Limit results to cards associated with the reference_id supplied.

sort_order.description:
Sorts the returned list by when the card was created with the specified order.
This field defaults to ASC.

$block:
Defines the fields that are included in the response body of
a request to the [ListCards](#endpoint-cards-listcards) endpoint.

Note: if there are errors processing the request, the card field will not be
present.

$ul: **cursor**: The pagination cursor to be used in a subsequent request. If empty,
**errors**: Information on errors encountered during the request.
